summary:
If you are currently responsible for innovation and you are not applying agile methodologies or collaborating (effectively) with startups, we need to talk.

I advise organisations on corporate - Startup strategies, collaboration & business models, investments and coach both corporate and startup teams to accelerate value creation. I am specialized and have vast worldwide experience in HealthTech, FoodTech and AgTech. 

I am well known to be able to change the status quo and get things moving faster. Also I am a strong believer in applying (my) knowledge and approaches cross-industry.

I would love to share my experience and knowledge and see how you can progress faster.

*A PhD in Molecular Immunology and over 20 years of experience in driving digital strategy and helping startup and corporate teams from concept to launch their digital Health/Food or Ag(tech) solutions using co-creation and lean startup approaches.
*Helping Corporates and startups to find each other, to define and execute collaborations and investments but even more important: to help corporates mature their readiness to work with startups,
*I am currently supporting Unilever Foundry worldwide where I help the business to define and execute their open innovation strategy, scout relevant startups, define and coach collaborations and investments and maintain a broad healthcare ecosystem with partners such as investors, accelerators, insurers, pharma, government.
*In addition, globally coaching startups and managing internal innovation teams in the areas of Healthcare, Wellbeing and Food/AgTech

I would love to share my knowledge and to see how I can help your organization to mature with respect to early stage innovation and startup collaborations.

treasury_media.title: TEDx | How to innovate health tech innovation | Rocco Van Den Berg
treasury_media.description: Rocco van den Berg is an innovation leader with over 17 years of experience driving digital strategies and disruptive product innovations. In this compelling talk, illuminated by his own life experiences, Rocco suggests that creativity, idea-sharing and personal background can 'speed up innovation to create a better world, faster'.

projects.title: Strategy development Dutch National Cancer Registry (IKNL)
Digital Health strategy & visionary speaker for various cure & care companies
projects.description: Based on my extensive background in both Medical sciences and Digital strategies I present a visionary story about 5 big trends that will shape the near future of Digital Health (Cure and Care). Also the need to transform your innovation strategy and approach is presented.

projects.title: Creativity workshop for top-level management CSM
projects.description: For CSM, marketleader in speciality foods, I organised a creative workshop to define the future steps for CSM strategy and how to communicate this internally using innovative approaches.

projects.title: Social Media Strategy Nationale Bioscoopbon
projects.description: Developed the social media strategy for the Dutch association of movie theatres and the nationale bioscoopbon. Also coached during the execution of the strategy.

projects.title: Creative Technology (University Twente) student guidance to develop Business capabilities
projects.description: Teaching, workshop and assessment of the students of Creative Technology at the University of Twente in order to make them business savvy and direct technology projects into viable business plans & cases.

projects.title: Developing Philips Digital Accelerator 2.0
projects.description: Based on earlier experiences setting up Innovation Labs using the Lean Startup approach, currently helping the Philips Digital Accelerator to move to a next phase, where the go-to-market approach for digital Health products is the main challenge. Involved in coaching, defining standards, setting up a Lean Startup Masterclass etc.

projects.title: Digital Health Lean Startup Coach for Philips - Radboud UMC partnership developing innovative remote diagnostic tools and propositions
projects.description: Responsible for coaching core team of Philips=Radboud UMC partners to apply Lean Startup approach to develop digital Health solutions

projects.title: Home Health Monitoring Pilot Lead at Philips
projects.description: Leading a digital Health pilot with Philips and a HomeCare organisation in the area of Home Health Monitoring

projects.title: Develop Learning & Development framework for Digital Skills across Sanoma
projects.description: Develop a framework, approach and curriculum for Digital skills for all Sanoma employees worldwide. Aligning with both business owners and HR directors in each of the countries. Setting up pilots for Sanomat Helsingin (Finland) and Libelle (Netherlands). Reporting to Chief HR Officer Sanoma

projects.title: Product, roadmap and requirement definition for mobile media monitoring solution for LexisNexis
projects.description: Defined the product requirements, multiscreen tactics and roadmap for the implementation of a state-of-the art Media monitoring system that includes print, online and TV content. Also defined analytics requirements and strategy based on customer insights and competitor analysis.

projects.title: Definition and execution of international Social Media Strategy, platforms and concepts for MoneYou/ABNAMRO
projects.description: Defined and executed international social media strategy for MoneYou, part of ABNAMRO. Also the development and execution of various creative social/mobile concepts and platforms such as Social Media Customer care, the first Facebook Banking App in Europe and managed the 'VriendenActie' a social media game where you could win money for friends.

projects.title: Business case and product development of Live Video Image & Voice recognition service for LexisNexis/ReedElsevier
projects.description: Leading for LexisNexis/ReedElsevier a consortium existing of TNO, University of Amsterdam, University of Twente, XMI, Euvision, LexisNexis, Stichting Beeld&geluid and CapGemini. Defined concept and developed working prototype of a innovative Mediascreener service that can monitor Live Radio and Television using image and voice recognition. Also aligned partnerships with Business News Radio and the Dutch Public Broadcasters to use their content in a trail period.

projects.title: Concept development and initiation of startup for SME Mobile direct printing, direct marketing and retail concept
projects.description: Concept and business development of a innovative Retail-DM concept based on mobile devices, personalized printing and SME marketing. Initiated and very much involved in this startup.

projects.title: Development and implementation of Social Media Strategy, Content & video strategy for AEGON
projects.description: For AEGON developed the social media strategy for it's various businesses and affiliates. In relation to that also developed the strategy for social Content in general and Video (formats) in particular. Implemented the strategy and formats afterwards.

projects.title: Multiple in-company creative workshops on Social Media
projects.description: For a large number of companies (recruitment, insurance company, ING bank, government, consultancy, food production, universities, sales consultancy, management trainers etc.) custom made workshops where I engage maximally with the audience not only by telling them everything they need to know about Social Media, but at the same time discuss custom made social media concepts that they can readily use

projects.title: Concept development and roll-out of a social media campaign to attract Youth to Provincial Government issues
projects.description: Developed a concept (HetEenofHetAnder) that makes youth clear that in politics choices have to be made. Based on Provincial government matters and linked to Good Causes different schools and Causes had to compete with each other using the social media platform Hyves. Besides the concept, also responsible for the very successful campaign as campaign manager and concept guardian.

projects.title: Cross departmental implementation of a licence & maintenance ICT solution for the Provincial Government of Overijssel
projects.description: Managed successfully the proces changes, organizational changes and the technical implementation of a complex ICT solution across two departments within the Provincial government of Overijssel.

projects.title: Defining and realisation of the innovation roadmap for International HR/Staffing organisation
projects.description: Defining the innovation/digital/mobile roadmap for the board of an international HR/Staffing organisation. Included internal inspirational sessions, competitor analyses, defining plans for approaches, business planning and business case constructions and negotiations with potential partners and internal stakeholders. Finally also assisting in the realisation of the calender which includes a mobile app for employees, an internal intelligent search engine, setup of a social network for lower educated people.

projects.title: Projectmanager European Procurement for Provincial licenses and maintainance ICT solution
projects.description: Managed the full project from requirements description, a full European Union Procurement selection procedure until the contract negotiations and signing with the solution provider for a system that is used to regulate all legal Provincial requirements around licenses

projects.title: Social Media Strategy National Maritime Museum
projects.description: Defined the cross-medial social media strategy for the dutch Maritime Museum with special focus on the re-opening of the museum. Closely working together with (digital) creative agencies.

publications.name: TEDx talk: How to innovate healthtech innovation
publications.publisher: TEDxLSE London School of Economics and Political Science

profile_positions.description: Helping the Unilever Nutrition and Icecream Business Groups to define their external Innovation strategy and to execute those together with Start-ups. I maintain a global network of investors, accelerators, incubators, start-ups and experts in the areas of AgriTech and FoodTech and work with them to scout, select start-up partnerships and to validate the value of a collaboration by working with farmers, suppliers around the globe. Current focus on Regenerative Agriculture, sustainable packaging, Alternative proteins for meat and diary transformation
profile_positions.title: Innovation Lead AgriFoodTech Unilever Foundry

profile_positions.description: Helping all Business Groups at Unilever to define new digital consumer propositions and support collaborations with digital Startups. Focus on BeautyTech and FoodTech
profile_positions.title: Innovation lead digital propositions

profile_positions.description:
I work as a independent contractor with 20 years of experience in the areas of Media, HealthTech and AgriFoodTech innovation.
Very strong believer and ambassador for corporate acceleration using Lean Startup Methodologies which I have applied and coached at various clients.

Main roles & activities for clients:
-Strategic advisor, coach and execution on corporate innovation
-Inspirational, digital visionary and innovation workshops, training and individual coaching
-Realisation of digital concepts, product development, strategies or organisation design (consultancy, project- and programme management, ad-interim management)

For description of projects see the LinkedIn Project section.
Customers include for example: Unilever, Philips, IKNL, Sanoma, LexisNexis, ABNAMRO, AEGON, Technical University Twente, CSM, Provincie Overijssel, ING, Vebego, StaatsLoterij
profile_positions.title: Owner

profile_positions.description:
-Globally driving maturation of the Connected Care cluster’s external partnership strategy,
technical cloud/IoMT/AI/platform readiness and operational process improvements and act as
startup collaboration manager for multiple partnerships. There I define and support partnership
and investment proposals. This has resulted in improved value creation, faster deal making and
increased the number of startup partnerships and investments.
-In Europe responsible for building and maintaining an ecosystem of healthcare startups, VC
firms, startup accelerators & incubators, hospitals, Universities and governmental agencies. This
has resulted in faster and better sourcing and qualification of startups and in the execution of
joined Philips-Startup-Hospital pilot & clinical trials.
-Until 2019: setup and drove multiple global startup-collaboration accelerators with focus on
AI/ML which resulted in a significant number of collaborations and investments
-Until 2019: setup a lean startup & design thinking based methodology and applied this on 50+
early stage innovation teams within Philips. This has resulted in a massive shortening of the
innovation cycle, provided improved KPIs to budget early innovation and has let to multiple new
businesses, spin-outs and IP development
-Representing Philips in National Startup-Corporate societies such as CoSta (VNO-NCW), TekDelta
and frequently speak (and source startups) at European conferences. This has resulted in the
positioning of Philips Ventures as being a best practice with respect to startup partnerships.
-Coaching startups across Europe with key accelerators (Rockstart, Health Innovation School,
Health Founders etc.)
profile_positions.title: Innovation lead Philips Ventures

company.name: TekDelta, matches corporates to high-tech startups

profile_positions.description: Since the launch of the new educational programme CREATE I am closely involved as member of the international Advisory Board. Creative Technology combines skill-set learning of both creative subjects as well as hardcore technology skills. I believe that training students with this set of skills is what future companies need. CREATE has proven in a very short time to be the fastest growing faculty within the Technical University. I am proud to be part of that.
profile_positions.title: Member Advisory Board Creative Technology

profile_positions.description: Ad interim responsible for defining and executing the digital strategy, acting as Programme Management Officer and responsible for business development activities to improve our digital performances. Also active role in divestment activities of non-core activities.
profile_positions.title: Director of Strategy & Business Development

profile_positions.description: Ad interim responsible establishing and management of 9 internal startup teams in the area of digital/mobile Consumer learning, Second screens, fashion, content marketplaces and Beauty. The international staffed and located teams work according to the Lean Startup Methodology and consist of both Sanoma employees as well as external resources. The goal of the Internal Ventures is to launch new successful international brands.
profile_positions.title: Head of Internal Ventures

profile_positions.description: Consumer Learning delivers internationally digital/mobile learning platforms to a wide range of customers, from kids to adults. Products vary from edutainment to video based learning to assessment tools to sharing platforms for educational content. My role is to grow this area and to ensure that international learnings, developments and sales are optimized for further growth.
profile_positions.title: International Coordinator Consumer Learning

profile_positions.description: Within the international programme 'the Future of TV' we are focussing on various projects dealing with the development of digital distribution strategies, consumer revenue strategies, second screens and alignment of TV with online.
profile_positions.title: Programme manager 'Future of TV'

volunteer_experiences.description: Beter Gezelschap wil meer duurzame, bezielende en persoonlijke aandacht voor het gezonde deel van de mens in de zorg krijgen. Humor, creativiteit, waardering en respect zijn daarbij onmisbare ingrediënten.
